name: Radical Witch
description:
Cici the witch can't fly with magic, so she uses explosives instead!

This is an endless runner-style game about a witch seeking to cause chaos in a dull world populated by cutesy ghosts. Throw bombs at ghosts to earn points and use the explosive force to launch yourself upwards and continue your rampage for as long as possible! Experience a rapidly increasing challenge as the game gets faster the more you score.

This was a school group project that I expanded upon with an interactive tutorial and sound options. We hope you enjoy!

Controls:

Z - Select (For menus and pop-up text)

X - Throw bombs

Left and right arrows - Move horizontally

Down arrow - Dive / fast-fall

Credits:

Santiago "SamuraiMantis" Ponce: Programming, Character Art, Interactive Tutorial

Citlalli Hernandez: Programming

Hunter Hechtl: Enemy & Background Art, Sound Design
